tree_review_delete_not_yet_uploaded_regi: The registration is not yet uploaded to Plant-for-the-Planet. Once deleted it will be lost forever.
tree_review_delete_uploaded_registration: This registration is safe on cloud. Once this registration is deleted, currently it is not possible to retrieve it on this app.
recommend_at_least_one_sample: Some of the planted species are not sampled. We recommend you to sample at least one tree for each planted species.
at_least_one_species: You should have at least 1 species before adding Sample Trees.
at_least_five_sample_trees: You should add at least 5 Sample Trees.
